DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study was that early re-ablation (test) was superior to AAD therapy (control) in patients with previous failed PVI ablation for paroxysmal AF.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of the Drug Therapy Versus Re-Ablation
DOC.criteria: history of symptomatic PAF congestive heart failure LV ejection fraction < 35% left atrial diameter > 60 mm
